page.title: 04Ashbourne Carnival
page.content: You have to organise carnival around {Christmas time}because it needs a lot of organising.The things which need organising are the carnival floats so they know which order of appearance they have to go in.They have to decide where the stalls have to go and what prizes they are going to give.Also the bands need a lot of organising and practise to know which tunes to play and how to play them.{Round table organises the carnival,they also organise the{fire works}and the{torch {light procession}which is held on Fish Pond Meadow where the fair is at every carnival.Around carnival time we have {window decorations}where people decorate their windows.There is always something wrong and you have to guess what.There is a{carnival Queen}every year.The point of the carnival is to raise money for charity.
